title: Bookmark This: OpenType conversion FAQ for Adobe end users
content:
—  
More information on compatibility and differences between the OpenType fonts and their Type 1 counterparts is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20060525034911/http:/store.adobe.com/type/opentype/). Look in the right-hand column for links to the two cross-reference documents, and the new font conversion FAQ. It’s this last document that explains at painful length the exact compatibility issues in substituting an  
OpenType version of an Adobe font for the former Type 1 version.  
—
author: Miss Tiffany
